name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's scientific laboratory on Punk Hazard where he conducts his cruel experiments. This facility is where Law and Vergo have their confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Vergo Crushes Law's Heart in the Lab
keyEvents.description: Vergo emerges from the shadows in Caesar's lab and crushes Law's disembodied heart, demonstrating his control over the situation.
keyEvents.significance: The laboratory serves as the setting for one of Law's most vulnerable moments.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Investigates the Lab
keyEvents.description: Chopper continues his investigation of Caesar's laboratory, uncovering evidence of experiments on the kidnapped children.
keyEvents.significance: The lab is revealed as the center of Caesar's inhumane experiments.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory is operational and being used by Caesar for experiments

name.japanese: パンクハザード毒の湖

description: A lake on Punk Hazard filled with poisonous water. Kin'emon's torso fell into this lake and was in danger of being eaten by a shark before Sanji's rescue.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Decides to Dive into the Poisoned Lake
keyEvents.description: Sanji makes the dangerous decision to dive into the toxic lake to rescue Kin'emon's torso.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Sanji's heroism in risking his life to save a stranger's body part.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Fights Shark in the Lake
keyEvents.description: Sanji fights off a shark that was attempting to eat Kin'emon's torso while swimming in the poisoned lake.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's combat abilities even in dangerous underwater conditions.

statusHistory.reason: Poisoned lake exists as a hazard on Punk Hazard

description: A former government research facility turned into Caesar Clown's base of operations. The island is split between a fiery side and a frozen side due to the battle between Akainu and Aokiji.

keyEvents.title: Kin'emon's Body Reunited
keyEvents.description: On Punk Hazard, Kin'emon's separated body parts are finally reunited after Sanji rescues the torso.
keyEvents.significance: The island serves as the location where Kin'emon can finally reveal his full identity and abilities.

keyEvents.title: Foxfire Style Demonstrated
keyEvents.description: Kin'emon demonstrates his Foxfire Style technique to save the group from the deadly slime creatures on Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration of a Wano Country sword technique in the series.
